price: YɛWura, yi asotwee no firi yεn so, Nokorε sε (afei deε) yεyε agyediefoͻ.
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
